comments.body:
Could add `length` to the interface as well for this PR.
```
length: number
```

I've tried to execute code so that I got those validation errors and they had no length even if documentation said so. Looking at the source code I don't see how as this is object without length and not an array. https://github.com/braintree/braintree_node/blob/master/lib/braintree/validation_errors_collection.js
Thanks for doing some sleuthing and following up. I agree.
